Title: üé¨ We asked the audience of Iran International what they thought ...
Description: We asked the audience of Iran International, what do you think about the proposed ministers of medicine? Shahrvandani says: It turned out that Medeshian has the role of a scarecrow in Khamenei's cabinet and he has to dance to every instrument of leadership. We, the people, should think about our situation. The respondent also stated: The doctors said on the first day that I am useless and that I am in the province. He had said that the ministers should be appointed through the leadership. Earlier, Shahram Dabiri, the parliamentary deputy of Masoud Mezikian, regarding the introduction of the members of the cabinet of the 14th government, wrote on X channel: - The president has clearly announced that he will appoint the members of the cabinet with the opinion of Khamenei and His approval will introduce.

Title: üé¨ The videos sent to Iran International show a group of Iranians...
Description: The videos sent to Iran International show that a group of Iranians living in Chicago held a protest rally against the issuance and execution of death sentences by the Islamic Republic on Sunday, August 21. The attendees carried photos of Mujahid Korkur and Abbas Daris, protestors who were sentenced to death.

Title: üñº The governor of Islamabad West, from the explosion and destruc...

Title: üé¨ Hamidreza Karmi, the governor of Islamabad West, was killed by...

Title: üîÅüñº üîª The closing ceremony of the 2024 Paris Olympics was held ...
Description: Forwarded From Iran International Sports The closing ceremony of the 2024 Paris Olympics was held and Thomas Bach, the head of the International Olympic Committee, took the flag of these games from the mayor of Paris and handed it to Karen Bass, the mayor of Los Angeles. He handed the flag to Simone Biles, Team USA's most decorated athlete at the Paris Olympics. Next, there was a special surprise; Tom Cruise appeared from the sky and took the Olympic flag from Biles and went into the crowd, got on a motorcycle and took the flag to Los Angeles; The 2028 Olympics will be held in LA and in the neighborhood of Hollywood. See more pictures here. @iraninltvsport

Title: üîÅüé¨ üîª Voice and Television of the Islamic Republic of Iran afte...
Description: Forwarded From Iran International Sports üîª After Alireza Heydari, the world wrestling champion, expressed his displeasure for Kimia Alizadeh's immigration in the program covering the closing of the 2024 Olympics, the Islamic Republic of Iran kicked him out of the program. This happened during the live broadcast. During the fight between Kimia Alizadeh and Nahid Kiani, the 57-kg Iranian taekwondo athletes who fought each other under the flag of Bulgaria and the other under the flag of Iran in the 2024 Olympics, they made statements against Kimia. They used Alizadeh, which faced a lot of criticism and the audience considered it an example of hate speech. Even Sed and Radio censored the scene of Nahid Kiani hugging Kimia Alizadeh. @iraninltvsport
